name: @rainstormy/preset-eslint-react
description: A predefined, opinionated ESLint configuration suitable for any web project with React components.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.@rainstormy/preset-eslint-base: This ESLint preset ships with type definitions for ESLint presets and their configurable options.
dependencies.@rainstormy/preset-eslint-jsx: This ESLint preset configures linting rules for JSX components such as React components.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-react-hooks: This ESLint plugin covers the Rules of Hooks in React components.

devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a statically typed programming language on top of JavaScript.

peerDependencies.eslint: ESLint is a peer dependency of `@rainstormy/preset-eslint-base`.
